stories.text:
Hi Hacker News!

It's safe to say that we all enjoy some quality apps on our phones. But guess what, there's a certain industry that's still clinging to the usability and security standards from the desktop era of the 2010s. Poorly designed UIs, bombardments of ads, random popups, scams, etc. This industry operates in such a shady way that we as users rather keep their products in incognito mode.

We say no more and offer you the following solution

USER EXPERIENCE Mobile first and native-like UI design. Beautiful dark mode that's easy on your eyes. Instant navigations, smooth scrolling, touch gestures. ⬇ Can be added to the home screen for fullscreen and quick access (PWA). No annoying ads and popups.

PRIVACY PROTECTION All data is stored locally in browser storage. No personal information is sent to servers. All functionality is available without sign up or other personal identification. No Google Analytics. Instead, we use the privacy-focused Fathom Analytics (usefathom.com). No URL paths that expose information in the browsing history. Forward/back navigation still works perfectly.

INCLUSIVITY Only personal (and verified) accounts allowed. No studios or brands. This means that all available content has been approved by their actors and was created consensually. We welcome all types of sexual orientation and try to provide the best possible service to all of our users.

Please note that this product is only intended for persons over the age of 18.

Happy swiping!
stories.title: Show HN: High-Quality NSFW Video App

stories.text:
Hi HN,

Arek here. We’re super excited to officially launch PSPDFKit API [1].

PSPDFKit API is a collection of HTTP APIs that enable you to convert, generate, and edit documents without running any service on your infrastructure.

What differentiates our API from others is that you can chain together multiple “actions” as part of a single API request. For example, you can convert, OCR, watermark, edit, and flatten a document — all in one call.

Available actions [2]:

- PDF Generator

- PDF Converter

- Image Converter

- OCR

- Watermark

- Merge

- Split

- Duplicate

- Delete

- Flatten

Our documentation includes sample code for JavaScript [3], Python [4], Java [5], C# [6], PHP [7], and the command line. We also have a Postman collection [8].

Let us know what you think or if you have any questions.

[1] https://pspdfkit.com/api/

[2] https://pspdfkit.com/api/documentation/tools-and-api/

[3] https://pspdfkit.com/api/tools/javascript/

[4] https://pspdfkit.com/api/tools/python/

[5] https://pspdfkit.com/api/tools/java/

[6] https://pspdfkit.com/api/tools/csharp/

[7] https://pspdfkit.com/api/tools/php/

[8] https://pspdfkit.com/api/documentation/getting-started/postman-collection/
stories.title: Show HN: PDF API – Generate, convert, and modify PDF documents
NASA's 'mega moon rocket' is heading to the launch pad
Netflix plans to start charging for password sharing, and customers aren't happy

stories.text:
I've learnt vim and have a good setup for programming already. I started learning/using emacs recently enticed by all the features I hear about. I think I'll need to spend some time with it to utilize it efficiently.

Is learning emacs worth it? I see hardcore emacs users complaining about how bad e-lisp is and macros causing RSI.
stories.title: Ask HN: Should I learn Emacs in 2022?
